SEARCH

Class Problem

java.lang.Object
Problem
public class Problem extends Object
Represents the Student Project Allocation Problem. Contains the lists of students, teachers, and projects to be matched.

    • solveGreedy

      public Solution solveGreedy()
      Implements a simple greedy algorithm for allocating projects to students. For each student, it assigns the first acceptable project that is not yet assigned.
      Returns:
      A Solution object containing the allocation
